example_sentence_italian: Ho bisogno di un aeroporto vicino.
Gli aeroporti sono molto trafficati in estate.
example_sentence_english: The airports are very busy in summer.

example_sentence_italian: Il rumore degli aeroporti è fastidioso.
example_sentence_english: The noise of the airports is annoying.
I'm going to the airport tomorrow.

example_sentence_italian: Consegnano i bagagli agli aeroporti vicini.
example_sentence_english: They deliver the luggage to the nearby airports.
I just returned from the airport.

example_sentence_italian: I voli dagli aeroporti internazionali partono tardi.
example_sentence_english: Flights from the international airports depart late.
There is a shop in the airport.
At the airports they check luggage.
There is a tower on the airport.

example_sentence_italian: Sugli aeroporti sono esposte le regole di sicurezza.
example_sentence_english: On the airports the safety rules are displayed.
I have an agreement with the airport.

example_sentence_italian: La società collabora con gli aeroporti regionali.
example_sentence_english: The company collaborates with the regional airports.

notes: 'Col' is con + il; not used before l' (vowel) — prefer 'con l''.
example_sentence_italian: Prendo accordi col aeroporto per un evento speciale.
example_sentence_english: I make arrangements with the airport for a special event.

notes: 'Coi' is con + i; not used before gli/l' — prefer 'con gli' or 'con l'' where appropriate.
example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo firmato un contratto coi aeroporti nazionali.
example_sentence_english: We signed a contract with the national airports.
